title: Instagram misogynistic abuse out of control, says report; company says it does act
content:
Instagram misogynistic abuse is rampant in private messages sent in the photo and video sharing app, says a new report.

The report claims that Instagram fails to act on 90% of abusive DMs reported to moderators – a claim the company denies …

more…

The post Instagram misogynistic abuse out of control, says report; company says it does act appeared first on 9to5Mac.
